title: nA pAli dEvatavammA
sahitya:
nA pAli dEvatamma ikapai nIpai mopitinammA bhAramu


anupallavi

  nA pATa nA pApakosagiti nA bATa nI dariki nI ravamE nA uniki


caraNam 1    ApAta madhurammu A lOcanAmrtamu nA pApa muraLiki andincavamma
    caraNam 2    rAmuni sannidhi hanumad gAnamu I mahi dhvanincu nArada gAnamu rAmakrSNanula 
amara gAnamu bhUmini sUrya candrulunnanta kAlamu I muraLI sunAduni sommu gAvimmu
